prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a powerful Chinese woman, signature ox-horn hair buns with white silk ribbons, wearing a blue silk qipao with gold embroidery
feature_prompt: Chinese woman, blue silk qipao, gold embroidery, ox-horn hair buns, hyper-realistic skin, intricate silk texture, photorealistic eyes, athletic build
